backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing the IPTV backend with channel CRUD (admin-only mutations), public channel listing, user profile management, and per-user favourites toggling, all protected by role-based access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (channel browser, HLS player, filters, favourites, dark theme) to their source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON dictionary providing one-line descriptions of each frontend source file, serving as a quick reference for the project's frontend structure.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS file defining Tailwind base styles and OKLCH CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes including backgrounds, accents, and sidebar colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the StreamVault app, loading Google Fonts (Inter and Barlow Condensed) and the hls.js CDN script alongside the React root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that simply renders the ChannelBrowser page inside the app.
frontend/src/components/ChannelCard.tsx: Channel card component displaying a thumbnail, live badge, selected state overlay, favourite heart toggle (auth-gated), and channel name/language/country badges with hover glow effects.
frontend/src/components/ChannelGrid.tsx: Responsive grid component that renders ChannelCard items with skeleton loading placeholders and an empty-state illustration when no channels match.
frontend/src/components/FilterControls.t: Filter bar component with language and country Select dropdowns, a clear-filters button, and a channel count display showing filtered vs. total results.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Top navigation bar component with logo, All Channels/Favourites filter tabs, and Internet Identity login/logout dropdown with user profile display.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog for first-time users to set a display name, which is saved via the saveCallerUserProfile mutation before dismissing.
frontend/src/components/VideoPlayer.tsx: Video player component that supports HLS streams via the hls.js CDN global and native HLS (Safari), with loading, error, mute, and fullscreen states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor, invalidating dependent queries whenever the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook wrapping DFINITY AuthClient to manage Internet Identity login, logout, and persisted identity state across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching channels, favourites, and user profile data, plus mutations for toggling favourites and saving profiles.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS stylesheet defining a permanent dark cinematic theme with OKLCH color tokens, custom utility classes for card glow, gradient text, and nav blur.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/ChannelBrowser.tsx: Main page component for the IPTV channel browser that renders the navigation, filter controls, video player, and channel grid. Handles filtering by favourites, language, and country using memoized derived state.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining a dark cinematic theme with OKLCH color tokens, custom fonts (Inter, Barlow Condensed), glow box shadows, and accordion/pulse keyframe animations.
project_state.json: Project state manifest describing the IPTV app's architecture, implemented features, known issues, and image requirements at schema version 1.0.0.
